msgSnippet: Let me rephrase my question: I have a web app (using JBuilder 5 and Ant). I have a JUnitTest for this app, and I want the build process of the main project to
messageBody:
Let me rephrase my question:
I have a web app (using JBuilder 5 and Ant). I have a JUnitTest for this
app, and I want the build process of the main project to run the AllTests
for it/
Where can I get information on 'how to'?
Thanks

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Hi there
Anyone knows where can I find a "How To" right build.xml for ANT to run the
test (AllTest.class)?
TIA
